title: Haas ranks among top schools in Better World Ranking
author: Haas News
excerpt:
Berkeley Haas was among the top US business schools ranked by Corporate Knights in the 2020 Better World Ranking. Haas rose to #19 this year, climbing steadily from #39 in 2017 to #23 last year, as the school increased its offerings and research related to diversity, equity & inclusion, corporate social responsibility, cleantech, and sustainability.
